title: Forever - Polanco
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Bakery, Fusion
description: The 2nd location of this American-style contemporary restaurant offering vegan comfort food; this one opened Jan 2015. On the menu are dishes like breakfast gluten-free pancakes, scrambled tofu, acai bowl, chilaquiles with melted nut cheese, organic Chiapas coffee with almond, coconut, or soy milk. On the lunch menu are tacos baja califlower, quinoa burguer, spicy jackfruit tacos, kale salad, stuffed chile poblano. For dessert raw chocolate ganache, blueberry cheesecake, carrot cake, vegan ice cream, gluten-free pastries.
